name: This Website!
description: This website is for my personal portfolio website. It's designed to showcase my professional journey, projects, skills, and passions. Built with React + TypeScript + Vite.

name: Earendil Capital
description: Digital forefront of Earendil Capital, Folke Hermansen's holding company. Features a sleek design, detailed portfolio sections, investment insights, company news, and integrated multimedia. Reflecting professionalism and dynamic innovation in the financial sector.

name: Shallow Orange
description: A light-hearted chess engine crafted in a 3-hour challenge, Shallow Orange offers basic functionality and play, inspired by lessons from class and a parody on Deep Blue. It encompasses simple evaluations, minimax, alpha-beta pruning, and book moves. Developed for enjoyment, its depth and performance reflect its quick inception.

name: Valknut Design
description: Valknut Design, crafted by Mads Hermansen and team, stands as a testament to modern web aesthetics and functionality. As a hub for our collaborative web design endeavors, the site exhibits a custom WordPress theme reflecting our unique design ethos. Although the site's active development has momentarily halted due to other pressing projects, its existing framework showcases our combined creativity.
